rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员获得 500 万美元资金，利用计算生物学和人工智能推动新的癌症发现由高级研究员凯蒂·波拉德 (Katie Pollard) 博士领导的格拉德斯通研究所 (Gladstone Institutes) 的一个多学科研究团队已通过一项新启动的资助计划获得了 500 万美元的资助，该计划旨在利用计算生物学和人工智能引发新一轮癌症发现浪潮。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Researchers-receive-245-million-to-propel-new-cancer-discoveries-using-computational-biology-and-AI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Researchers-receive-245-million-to-propel-new-cancer-discoveries-using-computational-biology-and-AI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e23426e7-dd7e-46e7-a71a-0ab276529c2d Tue, 12 Mar 2024 22:06:01 -0400 Researchers receive $5 million to propel new cancer discoveries using computational biology and AI
新研究揭示车辆制动隐藏的健康风险科学家们对车辆驾驶员刹车时释放到空气中的颗粒物知之甚少，尽管有证据表明这些颗粒物对健康的危害可能比从排气管排出的颗粒物更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/New-study-reveals-the-hidden-health-risks-of-vehicle-braking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/New-study-reveals-the-hidden-health-risks-of-vehicle-braking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=caf42efa-a600-45c9-9a6c-0c3b31a7f6bf Tue, 12 Mar 2024 22:00:39 -0400 New study reveals the hidden health risks of vehicle braking
研究表明 Kdm1a 蛋白在保持神经元身份方面发挥着至关重要的作用表观遗传过程允许不同的细胞类型从单一基因组中出现。在整个发育过程中，细胞通过以不同方式表达相同的基因组来分化并获得不同的特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Protein-Kdm1a-plays-a-crucial-role-in-preserving-neuronal-identity-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Protein-Kdm1a-plays-a-crucial-role-in-preserving-neuronal-identity-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=038e8b88-d8a0-4beb-bf5b-164fba33d8b5 Tue, 12 Mar 2024 21:55:01 -0400 Protein Kdm1a plays a crucial role in preserving neuronal identity, study shows
研究表明代谢综合征评分上升与癌症风险增加有关代谢综合征 (MetS) 评分轨迹，尤其是随着时间的推移而增加的轨迹，与各种癌症类型的较高风险相关，而慢性炎症会加剧这些风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Study-links-rising-metabolic-syndrome-scores-to-increased-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Study-links-rising-metabolic-syndrome-scores-to-increased-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f7371ca-2a10-4553-a854-f48b24da195c Tue, 12 Mar 2024 21:46:00 -0400 Study links rising metabolic syndrome scores to increased cancer risk
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 研究发现 Epstein-Barr 病毒蛋白的脆弱位点对两种实验室产生的单克隆抗体 (mAb) 和一种必需的 Epstein-Barr 病毒 (EBV) 蛋白质之间相互作用的研究发现了可用于设计针对这种极其常见病毒的治疗方法和疫苗的目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/NIH-study-uncovers-vulnerable-sites-on-Epstein-Barr-virus- Protein.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/NIH-study-uncovers-vulnerable-sites-on-Epstein-Barr-virus- Protein.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ad45422-0a8a-43ed-ad2d-16f1c91b67be Tue, 12 Mar 2024 21:45:10 -0400 NIH study uncovers vulnerable sites on Epstein-Barr virus protein
宾夕法尼亚州立大学团队确定了不同的睡眠模式及其与整体健康的相关性根据数十年的研究，不良的睡眠习惯与长期慢性健康状况密切相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Penn-State-team-identizes-distinct-sleep-patterns-and-their-correlation-to-overall-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Penn-State-team-identities-distinct-sleep-patterns-and-their-correlation-to-overall-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b320fb9d-c1d8-454f-8456-1162ccfdea7c Tue, 12 Mar 2024 21:37:43 -0400 Penn State team identifies distinct sleep patterns and their correlation to overall health
患有生殖细胞肿瘤的女性比患有类似癌症的男性预后更差患有一种称为生殖细胞肿瘤的卵巢癌的女性比患有类似肿瘤（即睾丸癌）的男性预后更差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Women-with-germ-cell-tumors-have-worse-prognosis-than-men-with-similar-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Women-with-germ-cell-tumors-have-worse-prognosis-than-men-with-similar-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48cac8bc-60fd-46c0-96c4-12b70baa8728 Tue, 12 Mar 2024 21:30:00 -0400 Women with germ cell tumors have worse prognosis than men with similar cancers
研究表明，怀孕期间吃坚果可能会减少孩子的同伴问题怀孕期间摄入坚果可以降低 5 岁日本儿童出现同伴问题的风险，但对其他行为问题没有显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Eating-nuts-during-pregnancy-may-lessen-childrens-peer-problems-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Eating-nuts-during-pregnancy-may-lessen-childrens-peer-problems-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b06dfc55-207c-4971-ba8f-966d6d9c3b54 Tue, 12 Mar 2024 20:01:00 -0400 Eating nuts during pregnancy may lessen children's peer problems, study suggests
新型喷雾凝胶有望实现更安全的内窥镜手术每年有超过 2000 万美国人接受结肠镜检查，在许多情况下，医生最终会切除 2 厘米或更大的息肉，需要额外的护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/New-sprayable-gel-promises-safer-endooscopy-surgeries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/New-sprayable-gel-promises-safer-endooscopy-surgeries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7b397b7-e8b8-44f2-865f-f163962c7ddd Tue, 12 Mar 2024 14:42:00 -0400 New sprayable gel promises safer endoscopic surgeries
研究：在抑郁症诊断后患心血管疾病的女性多于男性抑郁症患者患心血管疾病（CVD）的风险增加；然而，根据《JACC：亚洲》今天发表的一项新研究，在诊断出抑郁症后患心血管疾病的女性多于男性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Study-More-women-experience-cardiovian-disease-following-a-depression-diagnosis-than-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Study-More-women-experience-cardiovian-disease-following-a-depression-diagnosis-than-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58fd1410-4b5b-4451-b9ad-b6b33373f36a Tue, 12 Mar 2024 14:23:21 -0400 Study: More women experience cardiovascular disease following a depression diagnosis than men
